name: Grand Smash
description:
It's time to stop running and face them.
It's time to SMAAASHH!!!

With 5-10 minutes practice a day, everyone can be The Smasher.
Earn Bugcoins to buy new Smashers, and go on smashing...

Important:
⭐ This is only a simulator. When you bump into real bugs, run for your life!
⭐ SW developers: please share this debugger with your colleagues.
⭐ Most important - NO ADS 😄
